member.name: T:Plugin.LatestVersion.CrossLatestVersion
member.summary: Cross platform LatestVersion Plugin implementations. Use to access the implementation for the current platform.

member.name: P:Plugin.LatestVersion.CrossLatestVersion.IsSupported
member.summary: Checks if the plugin is supported on the current platform.

member.name: P:Plugin.LatestVersion.CrossLatestVersion.Current
member.summary: Gets the current LatestVersion Plugin implementation.

member.name: P:Plugin.LatestVersion.Abstractions.ILatestVersion.CountryCode
member.summary: Gets and sets the country code to use when looking up the app in the public store. Note: This is currently only needed/used by the Apple implementations (defaults to "us")

member.name: P:Plugin.LatestVersion.Abstractions.ILatestVersion.InstalledVersionNumber
member.summary: Gets the version number of the current app's installed version.
member.value: The current app's installed version number.

member.name: M:Plugin.LatestVersion.Abstractions.ILatestVersion.IsUsingLatestVersion
member.summary: Checks if the current app is the latest version available in the public store.
member.returns: True if the current app is the latest version available, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Plugin.LatestVersion.Abstractions.ILatestVersion.GetLatestVersionNumber
member.summary: Gets the version number of the current app's latest version available in the public store.
member.returns: The current app's latest version number.

member.name: M:Plugin.LatestVersion.Abstractions.ILatestVersion.OpenAppInStore
member.summary: Opens the current app in the public store.
